TextJPN: …そんなわけで、俺たちが神社にたどり着いた時は、……あぁお約束って素敵だなぁ。
TextENG: ...And so, when we made it to the shrine...  Ahh, cliches are wonderful.

TextJPN: 誰もが期待した典型的な修羅場が出来上がっていた。
TextENG: The typical scene of carnage everyone was expecting had come to fruition.

TextJPN: 「あぁら、さすがジロウさん。@k@vS07/09/330900018.若い子にもモテるのねぇ？@k@vS07/09/330900019.　いつの間にそんな人気者になってたのかしらぁん？」
TextENG: ``Oh, my, I should have expected no less, Jirou-san.@k@vS07/09/330900018. You sure are popular with children.@k@vS07/09/330900019. Since when were you such a celebrity, hmm?``

TextJPN: 「そそそそ、そんなことないよ！@k@vS07/08/330800019.　これはきっと何かの間違いさ…！@k@vS07/08/330800020.　はぅん！@k@vS07/08/330800021.　レナちゃん、そのあんまりくっついちゃ駄目だよ…！」
TextENG: ``Y-Y-Y-Y-You've got it all wrong!@k@vS07/08/330800019. This has to be some kind of mistake...!@k@vS07/08/330800020. Oof!@k@vS07/08/330800021. Rena-chan, don't cling to me like that...!``

TextJPN: 「ね～～～ぇ、富竹さぁん☆@k@vS07/02/330200103.　レナにもカメラのこととか、色々教えてほしいかな、かな！」
TextENG: ``Heeeeey, Tomitake-san☆@k@vS07/02/330200103. Can you teach Rena about all the things you can do with cameras? Can you teach her?``

TextJPN: 「いやぁ、あっははは、カメラの道は長く険しいが遣り甲斐充分さ！@k@vS07/08/330800023.　レナちゃんが興味を持ってくれたなんてうれしいなぁ…。@k@vS07/08/330800024.はは、ははははは、はは…」
TextENG: ``Well, I mean, ah hahaha, the way of the camera is long and treacherous, but it's definitely worth traveling!@k@vS07/08/330800023. I'm happy you're showing an interest in it, Rena-chan...@k@vS07/08/330800024. Haha, hahahahaha, haha...``

TextJPN: 「あぁら、別に私はいいのよ？@k@vS07/09/330900021.　だってジロウさんはとーってもやさしいベテランカメラマンなんですもの。@k@vS07/09/330900022.女の子が困ってたら、私に限らず、誰にだーって親切に教えちゃうのよねぇ？」
TextENG: ``Oh, well, don't mind me, then.@k@vS07/09/330900021. After all, Jirou-san is a very, very kind-hearted veteran cameraman.@k@vS07/09/330900022. He'd be nice and teach just about any interested girl, not only me—isn't that right?``

TextJPN: 「レナ、富竹さんのその親切でやさしいところ、だぁい好き…。@k@vS07/02/330200105.カメラのこととかぁ、……カメラ以外のこととかぁ…、…色々教えてほしいかな、……かな」
TextENG: ``That kind, gentle part of you, Tomitake-san... Rena loooves it...@k@vS07/02/330200105. I wonder if you could teach me... about cameras... and about many other things too... Many other things.``

TextJPN: 「カカ、カメラ以外のことって何かなぁ？！@k@vS07/08/330800026.　はは、はははははは…」
TextENG: ``Wh-What other things?!@k@vS07/08/330800026. Haha, hahahahahaha...``

TextJPN: 「ジロウさん、カメラ以外のことを聞いてもないのに教えてくれるの、得意だもんねぇ？@k@vS07/09/330900024.　そういう時のジロウさん、とっても強引なんだから」
TextENG: ``Jirou-san, you haven't even found out what those other things are yet, but you'll still teach her? You're so good at this.@k@vS07/09/330900024. At times like those, Jirou-san... can be very forceful.``

TextJPN: 「な、なな何が強引なのかな、…かなぁ！@k@vS07/02/330200107.　…でも、…レナ、富竹さんならその、…どんなこと教えてくれても、……いいかな、…かな」
TextENG: ``Wh-Wh-What is he forceful about, I wonder... I wonder!@k@vS07/02/330200107. ...But... Rena, well... if it's Tomitake-san... She'll let him teach her... just about anything... Just about anything.``

TextJPN: 「ぃえぁああぉおお、おっほはははははははは…！」
TextENG: ``No, ahhhh, ohhh, ohh hohahahahahahaha...!``

TextJPN: …富竹さんの気色悪い笑い声が境内に木霊する。
TextENG: ...Tomitake-san's gross-sounding laugh echoed through the shrine grounds.

TextJPN: 女の子に言い寄られたことのない全国平均な男子だったら、こういう反応になるのだろうか。…俺も他人事じゃないから、わが振りを大いに戒めよう。…そんな機会あるかどうか知らないが。
TextENG: Maybe an average boy of this nation who had never experienced a girl's advances would have this kind of reaction. ...I'm no stranger to that, so I ought to be cognizant of my behavior. ...Although, who knows if an opportunity like that will ever come.

TextJPN: とりあえず富竹さんたちには悪いが、傍から見てる分には大変楽しそうな修羅場だった。
TextENG: Anyway, maybe it would be rude to the two of them, but this was an incredibly amusing struggle when seen from afar.

TextJPN: 「レ、レナぁ！！@k@vS07/01/330100118.　目を覚ませ！！@k@vS07/01/330100119.　レナのその気持ちは偽物なんだぁああぁ！！」
TextENG: ``R-Renaaa!!@k@vS07/01/330100118. Open your eyes!!@k@vS07/01/330100119. Your feelings for him aren't real!!``

TextJPN: 「にに、偽物なんて酷いよ！@k@vS07/02/330200109.　これはレナの本当の気持ちなの！」
TextENG: ``A-A-Aren't real?! How rude!@k@vS07/02/330200109. These are Rena's true feelings!``

TextJPN: 「レナはね、気付いちゃったの…、富竹さんの本当のやさしさ！@k@vS07/02/330200111.　それはね、とってもささやかなものなんだけど、でも気付いちゃったらもう忘れられないの…！！」
TextENG: ``Rena realized something... Tomitake-san is really very kind!@k@vS07/02/330200111. It might not mean much at all, but now that I've realized it, I can't ever forget it...!!``

TextJPN: 「そのやさしさはね、きっとレナじゃないと気付けないの！！@k@vS07/02/330200113.　だからもうレナには富竹さんしかいないの！」
TextENG: ``I'm sure Rena is the only one who could ever appreciate his kindness!!@k@vS07/02/330200113. So Tomitake-san is the only one for Rena now!``

TextJPN: 「…は、……はああぁああぁぁぁぁ…」
TextENG: ``...Ha... Haaaaaaahhhhh...``

TextJPN: 脳内にあらゆる快感物質がだぼだぼと分泌しているのだろう。この世の極楽のような表情を浮かべた富竹さんが、朦朧としながらヨダレを一筋垂らしている。…それと好対照な鷹野の表情が実に愉快だ。
TextENG: His brain must have been producing every single chemical that could make him feel pleasant. Tomitake-san made a face like he was in heaven on earth, and he stood there in a daze, a trickle of drool hanging from his mouth. ...Takano's expression made for a marked contrast with his—and that contrast was truly delightful.

TextJPN: 「富竹さん！！@k@vS07/03/330300057.　鷹野さんを忘れちゃ駄目でしょ！@k@vS07/03/330300058.　自分のパートナーを見捨てちゃうの？！」
TextENG: ``Tomitake-san!!@k@vS07/03/330300057. You can't forget about Takano-san!@k@vS07/03/330300058. Are you going to abandon your own partner?!``

TextJPN: 「そ、そうさ…！@k@vS07/08/330800030.　レ、レナちゃんには悪いけど、僕には鷹野さんというパートナーがいるんだ！！@k@vS07/08/330800031.　だだ、だからその！」
TextENG: ``Th-That's right...!@k@vS07/08/330800030. I-I'm sorry, Rena-chan, but I already have Takano-san!!@k@vS07/08/330800031. S-S-So, well, I...!``

TextJPN: 「ふぅん…？@k@vS07/09/330900026.　パートナーってどういう意味かしら？@k@vS07/09/330900027.　私、横文字よくわかんないの。@k@vS07/09/330900028.ちゃんと日本語で言ってくれないとわかんないわぁ？」
TextENG: ``Hmm...?@k@vS07/09/330900026. I wonder what you mean by 'partner'?@k@vS07/09/330900027. You'll have to be more specific.@k@vS07/09/330900028. You have to say exactly what you mean, or I won't understand.``

TextJPN: 「いや、だからその、えっとえっと、ぁははははははは！」
TextENG: ``Er, well, I... umm, err... ahahahahahahaha!``

TextJPN: 「レナが教えてあげるねー！@k@vS07/02/330200115.　鷹野さんは富竹さんのお友達なのー！」
TextENG: ``Rena can tell you!@k@vS07/02/330200115. Takano-san is your friend, Tomitake-san!``

TextJPN: 「お、…お友達ィ…？！」
TextENG: ``His... his friend...?!``

TextJPN: 「ほ、ほほほほほほ！@k@vS07/09/330900031.　レナちゃんにはまだ大人の関係は理解できないかしら」
TextENG: ``Ho, ho ho ho ho ho ho!@k@vS07/09/330900031. Rena-chan, you don't understand adult relationships yet, do you?``

TextJPN: 「わかりますよーだ！！」
TextENG: ``I do too!!``

TextJPN: 「ねぇん富竹さぁん。@k@vS07/02/330200118.レナ、富竹さんと一緒に野鳥撮影がしたいし、富竹さんが望むなら、ナースさんの格好でモデルになってあげてもいいのにィ…」
TextENG: ``Come ooon, Tomitake-saaan.@k@vS07/02/330200118. Rena wants to take pictures of wild birds with you... and if you want... she can even dress up as a nurse and be your model, too...``
``Whaaaaaat?!@k@vS07/08/330800034. R-R-Really?!``

TextJPN: 「じゃなくって、駄目だよそんなの、僕には鷹野さんが…！！」
TextENG: ``No, wait, we can't, I already have Takano-san!!``

TextJPN: 「ナース姿が撮影したいって何度もお願いしても、ちっともＯＫしてくれない人の方がいいんですか…？」
TextENG: ``You'd rather have someone who you've asked several times to let you take a picture of her in a nurse outfit, but never gave you the okay...?``

TextJPN: 「しし、失礼ね…。@k@vS07/09/330900033.そんなことジロウさんが言うはずないでしょう？」
TextENG: ``H-H-How rude...@k@vS07/09/330900033. Jirou-san would never say anything like that.``
``That's a lie!!!``

TextJPN: 「レナには富竹さんの全てがわかるもん！！@k@vS07/02/330200122.　野鳥撮影とか言っておきながらいつも目線はふわふわ、鷹野さんの方ばかり！」
TextENG: ``Rena understands everything about you, Tomitake-san!@k@vS07/02/330200122. You say you're taking pictures of birds, but your eyes are always drifting to Takano-san instead!``

TextJPN: 「レナは知ってるの。@k@vS07/02/330200124.富竹さんは野鳥が撮りたいんじゃないんだよ、鷹野さんが撮りたいんだよ！」
TextENG: ``Rena knows.@k@vS07/02/330200124. You don't want to take pictures of birds! You want to take pictures of her!``

TextJPN: 「でも鷹野さんは思わせぶりなことを言うだけでちっとも撮らせてあげない！@k@vS07/02/330200126.　そんな意地悪な人はパートナー失格なのッ！」
TextENG: ``But all Takano-san does is say suggestive things, and won't let you take any pictures!@k@vS07/02/330200126. That's mean, and makes her a failure as a partner!``

TextJPN: 「だからレナが富竹さんとパートナーの座を、お～持ち帰りぃいいぃ～！！」
TextENG: ``Rena will take her seat as your partner home with heeer~!!``

TextJPN: 「レナなら富竹さんのモデルになってあげられるもん！@k@vS07/02/330200129.　ねぇ富竹さぁん、ナースさんの服、白いのと水色とピンクの…どれが好きかな、…かな」
TextENG: ``Rena would be your model, Tomitake-san!@k@vS07/02/330200129. Come on, Tomitake-san... For the nurse uniform... White, or light blue and pink... Which would you like... like?``

TextJPN: 「ふ、……ふ、…ふぉおわあああああぁああぁ！！　しゅっしゅっぽっぽ、ふおおおおおおおおお！！」
TextENG: ``Hu... hu... huoowaaahhhhhhhhhhh!! Shh... shh... ppp... huoooooooooh!``

TextJPN: とうとう富竹さんのＣＰＵが熱暴走したようだ。
TextENG: It looked like Tomitake-san's CPU finally experienced a thermal meltdown.

TextJPN: 両耳と両鼻から凄まじい蒸気を噴出すと、まるで機関車の物まねのようなわけのわからないことを口にしながら卒倒する。
TextENG: Steam burst from his ears and nose like a locomotive—and the sounds from his mouth were much the same—before he fainted.

TextJPN: 「も、もう知らないわ！！@k@vS07/09/330900035.　ジロウさんはレナちゃんに懇切丁寧にいろいろ教えてあげるといいのよ！@k@vS07/09/330900036.　知らない知らない知ぃらない！@k@vS07/09/330900037.　失礼しちゃう失礼しちゃう！！」
TextENG: ``I-I don't care anymore!@k@vS07/09/330900035. Fine, go on, kindly teach Rena-chan all sorts of things!@k@vS07/09/330900036. I don't care, I don't care, I don't care!@k@vS07/09/330900037. I'm leaving, I'm leaving!!``

TextJPN: 「ああぁ、二人の破綻を食い止められなかったか…。@k@vS07/01/330100121.沙都子、梨花ちゃん、準備はまだなのか？！」
TextENG: ``Ahhh, we couldn't stop them from breaking up...@k@vS07/01/330100121. Satoko, Rika-chan, aren't you ready yet?!``

TextJPN: 「行きますわよぉ！！」
TextENG: ``I'm doing it!!``

TextJPN: この雛見沢で裏山という例外を除いて、もっとも沙都子のトラップが張り巡らされた場所があるとしたら、それはこの境内だ！
TextENG: Other than the mountains behind Hinamizawa, these shrine grounds were where the majority of Satoko's traps had been set!

TextJPN: それらトラップが全て照準補正され、レナを一度に狙う！！
TextENG: She adjusted all their sights and aimed them at Rena!!

TextJPN: 「今だ、発射ぁああぁ！！！」
TextENG: ``Now! Fiiireee!!!``

TextJPN: レナに対し、四方八方からロケット弾のようなものが飛んでくる！
TextENG: Rocket-like objects flew at Rena from all sides!

TextJPN: ロケット花火を改造した、よい子のみんなは絶対に真似しちゃいけない危険トラップだ！！
TextENG: It was a dangerous trap using remodeled bottle rockets. One that all you good children should never attempt to imitate!!

TextJPN: 「って、…もうこれはトラップの領域じゃねぇ。@k@vS07/01/330100123.まるで軍艦の一斉砲撃だな…」
TextENG: ``No... This could hardly be called a trap anymore.@k@vS07/01/330100123. It was a full-on warship barrage...``

TextJPN: 「……暴走中のレナにあの程度の攻撃が効くとは思えませんのです…」
TextENG: ``...I don't think that attack is enough to stop Rena while she's gone berserk...``

TextJPN: 「でも、むせ込んでおりますわ！！@k@vS07/04/330400141.　圭一さん、今の内に富竹さんを連れ出すんですのよ！！」
TextENG: ``But it's choking her!!@k@vS07/04/330400141. Keiichi-san, take Tomitake-san away while we have the chance!!``

TextJPN: 「連れ出すってより引き摺り出すって感じだなッ！！」
TextENG: ``Take him away? I'll practically have to drag him!!``

TextJPN: 「はぅううぅ、みんな酷いよぉおぉ！！@k@vS07/02/330200132.　くしゅんくしゅん、ハックシュン！！」
TextENG: ``Hauuuu, why is everyone being so mean?!@k@vS07/02/330200132. Achoo, achoo, ahhh-choo!!``

TextJPN: 「をーっほっほっほっほ！！@k@vS07/04/330400143.　ロケット花火スパイスミックス、胡椒たっぷりバージョンですわよ！@k@vS07/04/330400144.　クシャミ地獄をお楽しみあそばせ！！」
TextENG: ``Ohhh ho ho ho ho!!@k@vS07/04/330400143. My bottle rocket spice mix—now with plenty of pepper!@k@vS07/04/330400144. Please enjoy your stay in a sneezing hell!!``

TextJPN: 「お、俺も巻き添えだけどな！@k@vS07/01/330100126.　ハクションハクション！！」
TextENG: ``W-Well, I got caught in it too!@k@vS07/01/330100126. Ah-choo, ah-choo!!``

TextJPN: 「とにかく一度、集会所の裏に隠れよう！！@k@vS07/03/330300063.　その間に富竹のおじさまの身体検査！@k@vS07/03/330300064.　勾玉を探すよ！！」
TextENG: ``Anyway, let's hide behind the assembly hall for now!!@k@vS07/03/330300063. And then we'll search Mr. Tomitake's body!@k@vS07/03/330300064. I'm sure he's got that magatama somewhere!!``

TextJPN: 「……何だか幸せそうな顔で泡を吹いていますのです。@k@vS07/05/330500117.でも目を覚ましたら色々と大変なのですよ。@k@vS07/05/330500118.今の内にかわいそかわいそなのです。@k@vS07/05/330500119.み～！」
TextENG: ``...He's frothing at the mouth, but he looks very happy.@k@vS07/05/330500117. But when he wakes up, it'll be terrible for him, I'm sure.@k@vS07/05/330500118. We should give him headpats while we can.@k@vS07/05/330500119. Meep~!``

TextJPN: 俺たちは富竹さんの体を引き摺り、一度集会所の裏に隠れた。
TextENG: We dragged Tomitake-san behind the assembly hall for now.

TextJPN: あの凄まじいクシャミ地獄でまだレナはクシャミを続けているが、それは大した時間稼ぎにはならないだろう。すぐにやって来るに違いない。
TextENG: Rena was still stuck in a severe sneezing hell, but that wouldn't hold her off for very long. She'd be over here in no time flat.

TextJPN: いや、それどころか今の攻撃で、俺たちのことを『恋路を邪魔するエネミー』だと認識しただろうから、何の容赦もなく先制攻撃を加えてくるはず…！
TextENG: And not only that—she probably now thinks of us as 'obstacles in the way of her love', so she'll come at us in a pre-emptive attack, one utterly without mercy...!

TextJPN: 「ほらほらボディチェック！@k@vS07/03/330300066.　ポケットの中とか探って！！」
TextENG: ``Come on, pat him down!@k@vS07/03/330300066. Fish around in his pockets and stuff!!``

TextJPN: 「小銭だのくしゃくしゃのレシートだの。@k@vS07/06/330600039.みっともない中身ですねぇ！」
TextENG: ``Small change, crumpled up receipts...@k@vS07/06/330600039. What a shameful collection of possessions!``

TextJPN: 「…おかしいな、見つからないぜ？@k@vS07/01/330100128.　富竹さんが持ってるんだよなぁ？」
TextENG: ``...That's strange. I can't find it.@k@vS07/01/330100128. Tomitake-san has it, right?``

TextJPN: 「……梨花ぁ、あなたも手伝いなさいませ！@k@vS07/04/330400146.　レナさんがこっちに来るまでに見つけませんと！」
TextENG: ``...Rikaaa, you help too!@k@vS07/04/330400146. We have to find it before Rena-san gets here!``

TextJPN: 「み、みぃ…、もちろん探したいのですが、…探知機が富竹を指していないのです！」
TextENG: ``M-meep... of course I want to search for it, but... the radar isn't pointing toward Tomitake!``

TextJPN: 「はぁっ？！@k@vS07/04/330400148.　探知機が指していないってことは、無いってことじゃありませんの！@k@vS07/04/330400149.　じゃあレナさんはどうして富竹さんを追っていたのでございますか！@k@vS07/04/330400150.　勾玉を手放しているのに？！」
TextENG: ``What?!@k@vS07/04/330400148. If the radar isn't pointing to him, doesn't that mean he doesn't have it?!@k@vS07/04/330400149. Then why was Rena-san chasing Tomitake-san?!@k@vS07/04/330400150. He doesn't have the magatama anymore!``

TextJPN: 「…みぃ！@k@vS07/05/330500122.　古文書によるとフワラズの勾玉は脳の恋愛レセプターを刺激して、その結果として恋愛時と同じ脳内物質を分泌させますです。@k@vS07/05/330500123.その結果、擬似的な恋愛感情が生まれて、…みぃ！」
TextENG: ``...Meep!@k@vS07/05/330500122. According to the ancient texts, the Magatama of Fuwarazu stimulate the brain's love receptors, and makes your brain secrete the same chemicals as when you're in love.@k@vS07/05/330500123. That's how it creates false feelings of love... meep!``

TextJPN: 「つまりです、富竹が手放した後もしばらくの間、効果が残っていたと考えてほしいのですよ…！」
TextENG: ``The effects will still be active for a little while, even if Tomitake no longer has it...!``

TextJPN: 「ああもうっ、こンのクソ忙しい時にもっともらしそうなことをー！！」
TextENG: ``Aah, come on, we're too damn busy for your seemingly-sensible blathering!!``

TextJPN: …そもそも『恋愛レセプター』なんて単語が書いてある古文書ってどんだけ～？
TextENG: ...And what sort of ancient documents contain words like 'love receptors' in the first place~?

TextJPN: 「つまり…。@k@vS07/04/330400152.富竹さんはさっきまでは持っておりましたけど、今はもう持ってないということでよろしいんですの？！」
TextENG: ``So, in other words...@k@vS07/04/330400152. Tomitake-san had it until a few moments ago, but doesn't anymore, is that what you're saying?!``

TextJPN: 「何だってー？！@k@vS07/01/330100130.　ってことはレナはどうなってんだ？」
TextENG: ``What was that?!@k@vS07/01/330100130. Wait, then what'll happen to Rena?``

TextJPN: 「あーッ！！@k@vS07/06/330600042.　いつの間にかいなくなっていますよ！！@k@vS07/06/330600043.　新しい勾玉の持ち主を捜しに行ったに違いありませんね！！」
TextENG: ``Ahhh!!@k@vS07/06/330600042. Suddenly, she's nowhere to be seen!!@k@vS07/06/330600043. She must have gone looking for whoever has the magatama now!!``

TextJPN: 「ま、まずいね！@k@vS07/03/330300068.　レナを見失ったら私たちにはヒントがない！」
TextENG: ``Th-That isn't good!@k@vS07/03/330300068. If we lose sight of Rena, we'll have no way of knowing who she's after now!``

TextJPN: 「…となったら、この幸せあんぽんたんさんを起こして話を聞く方が早いですわね！」
TextENG: ``...Which means it would be faster to wake up this lucky fool and ask him!``

TextJPN: 「…お任せなのです」
TextENG: ``...Leave that to me.``

TextJPN: 梨花ちゃんは、都合よくそこにあった蛇口をひねると、ホースの先端を富竹さんの顔に向けた。
TextENG: Rika-chan twisted a faucet that was conveniently nearby and pointed the hose at Tomitake-san's face.

TextJPN: …って梨花ちゃん、容赦がないな。…ちょっとムカついてる？
TextENG: ...Wow, Rika-chan is merciless. ...Is she a little pissed off?
``Uwah!!@k@vS07/08/330800038. Ack, ow... wait... it was a dream?@k@vS07/08/330800039. Was all that a dream...?!``

TextJPN: 「はは、レナちゃんがナースさんの格好で撮影会なんて、…はは、おかしいと思ったんだよ。@k@vS07/08/330800041.それで鷹野さんと仲違いしちゃうなんて、ははは…。@k@vS07/08/330800042.とんでもない夢だったなぁ」
TextENG: ``Haha, Rena-chan offering to dress up like a nurse for a photoshoot... Haha, I knew it was strange.@k@vS07/08/330800041. And breaking up with Takano-san over it... Hahaha...@k@vS07/08/330800042. What a terrible dream that was.``

TextJPN: 「あ、あははははは！@k@vS07/01/330100132.　ゆ、夢でよかったですねぇ！@k@vS07/01/330100133.　それより富竹さん！@k@vS07/01/330100134.　昨日、白い勾玉を拾いましたよね？！」
TextENG: ``Ah, ahahahaha!@k@vS07/01/330100132. I-It's a good thing it was a dream!@k@vS07/01/330100133. Anyway, Tomitake-san!@k@vS07/01/330100134. You picked up a white magatama yesterday, right?!``

TextJPN: 「え、…えぇ？@k@vS07/08/330800044.　勾玉なんて知らないよ。@k@vS07/08/330800045.でも、白いオットセイのキーホルダーなら拾ったなぁ。@k@vS07/08/330800046.ほら、昨日、圭一くんと会ったダム現場でだよ」
TextENG: ``Huh... what?@k@vS07/08/330800044. I don't know about any magatama.@k@vS07/08/330800045. But I did find a white key ring with a seal on it.@k@vS07/08/330800046. Here, look. We found it when we ran into Keiichi-kun at the dam site yesterday.``

TextJPN: 「…そのキーホルダーなのです！@k@vS07/05/330500127.　どうしましたですか？！」
TextENG: ``...That's the key ring!@k@vS07/05/330500127. What happened?!``

TextJPN: 「うん。@k@vS07/08/330800048.ついさっき鷹野さんにプレゼントしたよ。@k@vS07/08/330800049.拾い物なんて嫌ぁねぇとかいいながら、ちゃんと受け取ってくれてね！@k@vS07/08/330800050.　彼女のそういう素直じゃないところが、また魅力的なんだよ、たははは…」
TextENG: ``Right.@k@vS07/08/330800048. Well, I just gave it to Takano-san as a present.@k@vS07/08/330800049. She complained about me picking it up off the ground, but she still accepted it anyway!@k@vS07/08/330800050. She's really dishonest sometimes, which makes her all the more charming to me, tahahaha...``

TextJPN: 「ってことは、鷹野さんだッ！！@k@vS07/03/330300070.　さっき鷹野さんはどっちへ行ったっけ？！」
TextENG: ``That means it's Takano-san!!@k@vS07/03/330300070. Where did Takano-san just go?!``

TextJPN: 「向こうはえっと沢の方だな！@k@vS07/01/330100136.　まずいぞ、もうレナが向かってる！！」
TextENG: ``I think, uh, the swamp is over that way!@k@vS07/01/330100136. Oh, no! Rena's already headed there!!``

TextJPN: 「あ、相手が女の人でもお構いなしなんですね…！@k@vS07/06/330600045.　恐ろしい効果です…！！」
TextENG: ``I... I see it doesn't matter that she's a woman...!@k@vS07/06/330600045. What a frightening effect...!!``

TextJPN: 「…意外なカップリングに私も驚きましたわ」
TextENG: ``...This pairing is a surprise to me, too.``

TextJPN: と、他人の不幸を嘲笑いながらも、部活メンバーのこととあっては放っておけない。
TextENG: I like to laugh at the misfortune of others, but she was a club member, so we couldn't leave her be.

TextJPN: 俺たちは沢の方へ駆けて行った。
TextENG: We ran off toward the swamp.
